body_html: @carpodaster seems like the "redirect after login" issue is still not fixed — at least it seems like it doesn't work with the https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/apply link, which is a bummer because I would love to link to the application page directly from ie. the application guide. Right now, the "blogs" as an index page for the teams app (which is the page we link to by default, and the page which is shown by default when logging in) seem to be pretty confusing for most students applying. I'll investigate further, to see if there's anything we've overlooked..
